description: Force Techniques represent a deeper understanding of The Force and, like martial skills, usually come with years of practice. A few gifted or devoted Force-users learn to master them more quickly. In general, Force Techniques are only available to characters with levels in certain Force-using Prestige Classes (such as Force Adept, Jedi Knight, and Sith Apprentice).
notes: Whenever you gain access to a new Force Technique, select it from the list below. Once selected, a Force Technique cannot be changed.

techniques.name: Force Point Recovery
techniques.description: Core Force Technique for Force Point recovery.

techniques.name: Force Power Mastery
techniques.description: Core Force Technique for mastering Force Powers.

techniques.name: Improved Force Trance
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to enter a Force Trance.

techniques.name: Improved Move Light Object
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to move light objects with the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Sense Force
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to sense the Force in your surroundings.

techniques.name: Improved Sense Surroundings
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to sense your surroundings through the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Telepathy
techniques.description: Enhances your telepathic abilities through the Force.

techniques.name: Dominate Mind
techniques.source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
techniques.description: Allows you to dominate the minds of others through the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Energy Resistance
techniques.source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
techniques.description: Enhances your resistance to energy attacks.

techniques.name: Improved Force Slam
techniques.source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to slam opponents with the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Force Stun
techniques.source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to stun opponents with the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Ionize
techniques.source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to ionize and disable technology.

techniques.name: Improved Kinetic Combat
techniques.source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
techniques.description: Enhances your kinetic combat abilities through the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Resist Force
techniques.source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
techniques.description: Enhances your resistance to Force Powers.

techniques.name: Improved Valor
techniques.source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to inspire valor in allies.

techniques.name: Improved Vital Transfer
techniques.source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to transfer life force.

techniques.name: Language Absorption
techniques.source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
techniques.description: Allows you to absorb and understand languages through the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Battle Strike
techniques.description: Enhances your battle strike capabilities.

techniques.name: Improved Dark Rage
techniques.description: Enhances your dark rage abilities.

techniques.name: Improved Force Disarm
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to disarm opponents with the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Force Thrust
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to thrust opponents with the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Force Grip
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to grip opponents with the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Force Lightning
techniques.description: Enhances your Force Lightning abilities.

techniques.name: Improved Mind Trick
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to perform mind tricks.

techniques.name: Improved Rebuke
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to rebuke Force Powers.

techniques.name: Improved Repulse
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to repulse enemies with the Force.

techniques.name: Advanced Vital Transfer
techniques.description: Advanced technique for transferring life force.

techniques.name: Improved Cloak
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to cloak yourself in the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Levitate
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to levitate objects and beings.

techniques.name: Improved Malacia
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to induce nausea and disorientation.

techniques.name: Improved Phase
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to phase through objects.

techniques.name: Improved Rend
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to rend targets with the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Shatterpoint
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to perceive and exploit shatterpoints.

techniques.name: Improved Technometry
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to interface with technology through the Force.

techniques.name: Detoxify Poison
techniques.description: Allows you to detoxify poisons using the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Ballistakinesis
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to hurl objects at high velocity.

techniques.name: Improved Dark Transfer
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to transfer dark side energy.

techniques.name: Improved Detonate
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to detonate objects with the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Enlighten
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to enlighten and inspire.

techniques.name: Improved Lightning Burst
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to unleash bursts of Force Lightning.

techniques.name: Improved Obscure
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to obscure yourself in the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Force Shield
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to create Force shields.

techniques.name: Improved Stagger
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to stagger opponents with the Force.

techniques.name: Cure Disease
techniques.description: Allows you to cure diseases using the Force.

techniques.name: Extended Blind
techniques.description: Extends the duration of Force Blind.

techniques.name: Extended Force Disarm
techniques.description: Extends the range of Force Disarm.

techniques.name: Extended Force Grip
techniques.description: Extends the duration and range of Force Grip.

techniques.name: Extended Force Thrust
techniques.description: Extends the range of Force Thrust.

techniques.name: Extended Move Object
techniques.description: Extends the range and capabilities of Move Object.

techniques.name: Improved Convection
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to manipulate heat through the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Crucitorn
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to suppress pain and continue fighting.

techniques.name: Improved Cryokinesis
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to manipulate cold through the Force.

techniques.name: Improved Fold Space
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to fold space and teleport.

techniques.name: Improved Force Light
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to use Force Light against dark side effects.

techniques.name: Improved Force Storm
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to create devastating Force Storms.

techniques.name: Improved Plant Surge
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to control and manipulate plant life.

techniques.name: Improved Thought Bomb
techniques.description: Enhances your ability to create devastating Thought Bombs.
